Recollections of Handel
Brecon, Breconshire, South Wales Best baritone - Seven Sisters. Best basses - Llansaint. Prizes - 1st £8, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. 3 bands competed.
Sept. 24, 2018, 8:57 a.m. Sept. 24, 2018, 11:23 a.m.
1 Seven Sisters D. W. Morgan
2 Llansaint Silver A. G. Harries
3 Ystradgynlais Public Band Henry Williams
